ygData.subject: Dyes: What color from what Item?
ygData.msgSnippet: Below is a list of colors that I am hoping to have verified. When I started collecting Dye material, I was on as my troll and found the fungusman fungus and in
ygData.messageBody:
Below is a list of colors that I am hoping to have verified. When I
started collecting Dye material, I was on as my troll and found the
fungusman fungus and in one guide it says it makes red, the one below
says purple.
Also, as my Druid in Unrest I found another fungus or mushroom on the
Jack-O-Lanterns which I think makes yellow.

Can anyone comfirm this and the list below as acurate?


Item - Color Made - Location Found

Permafrost Crystals - Blue - Ice Goblins in Permafrost

Evergreen Leaves - Green - On Ground in Gfay Foriaged (Loc?)

Sarcoscypha Fungus - Purple - Fungus Men, Innothule

Russet Oxide - Red - Found on Earth Elementals, Steamfont

Iron Oxide - Brown - Earth Elementals, Steamfont, Najena, The Hole

Charcoal Black - Black - Mist, Air Elementals, Ecommons, Steamfont
(use see invis)



Thanks in advance.

--
Arakine Uktena *Changing Tide*
Wood Elf Druid
32nd Tree
Fennin Ro
--
Bdarr *Changing Tide
Dark Elf Necromancer
12th Tier of Hate
Master Smith ~173 Skill~
Fennin Ro
--
Arakian *yet to be guilded*
Dark Elf Shadow Knight
4th Tier of Hate
Fennin Ro
